name: Manspreading
description:
This game is a parody of the "problem" known as Manspreading and which has generated controversy, because the complaints are mostly on the subway, even in the subway of Madrid (Spain) there are posters with complaints about men opening their legs and occupying space with other travelers, in this case the complaint comes from women in society, making reference to what is a type of sexism.

The idea of the game arose by making jokes about the complaint that the appearance of Manspreading provoked in television media, youtube and twitter.

What i like about making games is the part of developing the idea, and modeling on 3DMax or Zbrush.

I am a Technical Artist, and i created Manspreading the last year of my degree in the university.

Actually im not working on any project but i keep improving my skills on 3DMax and Zbrush.

If you liked the game and want to support me on twitch or twitter I'll thank you
